## About

I am a Ph.D. candidate in Economics with broad interests in applied microeconomics. I use field (or lab in field) experiments to understand questions related to:

1. Social norms, social networks, and belief-formation;
2. Intergenerational persistence of poverty and inequality.

## Education

University of California, Berkeley | Ph.D. in Economics | July 2023 (expected)

IIIT Hyderabad | B.Tech in Computer Science | July 2008
